title: Am I allowed to advertise my Twitch stream, and which board would it go in?
body: Hey! I'm just starting a brand new Twitch stream and I was wondering if letting people know on the forums is allowed and if so, which board I should use? Thanks for your time! {{item:3157}}

replies.body:
I don't believe that sharing your stream would be against the [universal rules](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/4LgZ2EwM-universal-rules)!  I'd recommend posting it in [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), and just be considerate of your peers by keeping it to a single thread!  Have fun with your stream!

I'm not a part of the moderation team, but this would be my best guess!
will do! thank you good sir!
